metaTitle: Gamecheck: Protecting Players from Counterfeit iGaming
metaDescription: Welcome to Gamecheck - Protecting players from counterfeit games in the iGaming industry.
verifiedNote: Gamecheck verifies the use of authentic games
notVerifiedNote: Gamecheck has not commenced investigation yet on this provider.
fakeGameNote: Gamecheck identifies and confirms the presence of unauthorized or counterfeit games.
verificationUnderway: We are currently verifying the authenticity of the games provided by this vendor. At this time, we cannot confirm whether the games are authentic or counterfeit.
softwareTemperingNote: Software tampering refers to the unauthorized manipulation of game components by the operator, which may alter the Return to Player (RTP) rates, gaming experience, or the amounts wagered. Such actions can undermine the fairness and integrity of the game.
